participant_2.background:
My panda mug is my most valued material possession because it reminds me of my favorite animal.
I love to listen to music while I'm working on my photography projects.
i like sports.
i have a dog named socks.
i love to socialize.

content.text: Hi there, I'm a huge music lover, what about you?
Me too! I love to listen to music while I'm working on my photography projects.
Cool, what kind of photography do you do?
I mostly do landscapes and nature photography. I love taking pictures of animals and plants.
That sounds really cool! I love animals too, I have four dogs.
Wow! That's a lot of dogs! I only have one, his name is Socks.
Socks is a great name for a dog! What kind of dog is he?
He's a golden retriever. He's the sweetest dog ever.
I love golden retrievers! They're so friendly and loving.
They are! I'm so glad I have him.
It sounds like you have a great life!
It is pretty great! I love my dog and my photography. What are some of your hobbies?
I love playing sports, I played football in college. I also love to cook and bake.
That's really cool! I'm not very athletic, but I love to cook too.
What's your favorite thing to cook?
I love making pasta dishes. I'm pretty good at making homemade pasta.
That sounds really good! I love pasta.
It's really easy to make! I can give you some tips if you want.
That would be great! I'd love to learn how to make homemade pasta.
Sure, I'll send you a message later with some tips.
Great! Thanks so much!
No problem
